about_the_game:
In Troubadours, you start your own troupe of medieval entertainers, and lead them to glory while pursuing your own quest for justice.

Life Sim




You build your camp, made of tents and horse-drawn wagons, and make sure everyone’s needs are satisfied.

Musical Management




You create all sorts of musical acts, some small, some large. You decide which songs they learn, how often they rehearse, and where they perform. You play their shows through a live music mini-game.

Emergent Drama


Each character in your troupe comes with their own colorful personality. As they live and work together, they generate countless situations. Some are funny, some are tragic, but they usually require your attention. Imagine running your own reality show with a band of talented misfits.

The road to glory is full of drama and each troupe creates its own storyline.

short_description: Troubadours is a management simulation game where you lead artists in a fantasy medieval world. Build your troupe’s camp to meet their needs, manage musical acts, play their shows, and deal with the drama and comedy generated by their colorful personalities.
